name: Devyce
headline: The global mobile network for business.
description:
Devyce is building the global mobile network for business. Right now, we give your employees a business phone number in an app, on their personal phone, instantly, alongside a portal for analytics, management and integrations.

Nick has a background in recruiting and real estate and understands the pain points these industries face with hybrid working, while Ed has a solid tech background including a CS degree from Cambridge. Because of our relationship with a mobile network operator, we have the unfair advantage that we will actually become a mobile network, unlike other SaaS VoIP providers.

https://devyce.com/

founders.name: Nick Browne, Founder
founders.description: Nick has spent the last 4 years working in telecoms as VP of Business Development for Stour Marine a UK Mobile Network Operator. Before entering the technology space he spent several years in finance at Deutsche Bank and HSBC.

founders.name: Edward Clayton, Founder
founders.description:
I'm a developer from Lancashire, England. I've lived in London for the last 20 years or so, except for some overseas stints (I'm currently in Kazakhstan). I've a knack for interesting technical solutions, but besides that, I enjoy skiing and wine.

Most of my career has involved C#, which I guess is what comes from working in finance in London.

[Contact Us](https://devyce.com/<https:/devyce.com/email-support/>)[Try for Free](https://devyce.com/<https:/devyce.com/pricing>)
# The phone system for smarter calls
Devyce is an AI-powered communication system that enriches your customer relations and boosts your productivity. Transparent, reliable and comprehensive.
[Try for Free](https://devyce.com/<https:/devyce.com/pricing>)
[](https://devyce.com/<https:/uk.trustpilot.com/review/devyce.co.uk?utm_medium=trustbox&utm_source=MicroReviewCount>)
[](https://devyce.com/<https:/uk.trustpilot.com/review/devyce.co.uk>)
## Get the most out of your conversations with Devyce
### Devyce is the all-in-one VoIP system that unlocks your team's potential in each and every call.
![IA icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66260a0b39d9ccc493165403/66265c1139be7b364f645bd5_ia-icon.svg)
### AI Driven Features
Get live call analysis and stats that funnel into your CRM. Bring your phone system records to the same standard as email.
![No contracts icon
](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66260a0b39d9ccc493165403/66265c0f8f7b0e611a389028_no-contracts-icon.svg)
### No Contracts, Just a Monthly Subscription
All our plans include unlimited global inbound calls and texts and a generous outbound calling and messaging allowance. There are no contracts to worry about.
![Rocket icon
](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66260a0b39d9ccc493165403/66265c0e84a2e6cb7ba1ff23_innovative-icon.svg)
### Innovative and Reliable
Our expert engineers proactively innovate, swiftly adding new features to enhance user experience and stay ahead in communication technology.
![Globe icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66260a0b39d9ccc493165403/66265c0eae29db873dd5f615_globe-icon.svg)
### Global Availability of Numbers
Get numbers worldwide while safeguarding your team's personal line privacy. Devyce is designed to ensure seamless calls and connectivity.
![Rule icon
](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66260a0b39d9ccc493165403/66265c0e5c005f5e66ec91e9_flexible-icon.svg)
### Flexible and Customizable
Adding and removing users is a piece of cake with Devyce. If any of your team members decide to leave, you can remove them from the system as needed.
### Workflow Automation
Enhance team collaboration and communication by integrating our phone system with your everyday collaboration tools such as JobAdder, Bullhorn, Hubspot and Vincere.
### Painless and Agile Setup
1
##### Select your plan
Choose the plan that fits your business needs, whether you're a solo entrepreneur or a large enterprise.
2
##### Download and deploy
Download our intuitive app on your preferred device and start using Devyce instantly.
3
##### Customize and scale
Tailor Devyce to your exact requirements and scale effortlessly as your business grows.
![Mobile icon
](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66260a0b39d9ccc493165403/66267b00c2bf0ee76779e421_mobile-number-icon.svg)
Bring any UK mobile number and have it live in our system within a few hours.
![Customer service icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66260a0b39d9ccc493165403/66267b00b02abab8dde0cb0f_customer-service-icon.svg)
Our customer service and technical support are available 24 hours a day. 
![Palm icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66260a0b39d9ccc493165403/66267b02d30fc3208234c030_palm-icon.svg)
Forget about contracts.
![Illustration of how Devyce works](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66260a0b39d9ccc493165403/66266b66ffedbb659298c7be_devyce-illustration.png)
#### Devyce made their communications and lives easier
Our team (who are a mix of office, hybrid and remote) love the simplicity, reliability and functionality of Devyce. The AI-powered transcribe function has been a game changer for us in terms of streamlining calls and automatically adding notes straight into our CRM. We've also found the Devyce team to be really responsive and keen to help us get the best out of the system.
![Sandra McKinnon photo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66260a0b39d9ccc493165403/66729675901c400786e78869_Captura%20de%20pantalla%202024-06-19%20a%20las%2010.23.28.png)
###### Sandra McKinnon
Head of Operations - Harvey John, UK
We are specialists in the maritime industry, so we need to speak to people around the world(...). Overall Devyce has made a significant saving in admin time as well as freeing us from multiple individual contracts to allow staff to call from home. It is certainly a big leap over what we had before.
![Steve Cox photo
](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66260a0b39d9ccc493165403/66729706853c8217aab84c1d_Captura%20de%20pantalla%202024-06-19%20a%20las%2010.28.44.png)
###### Steve Cox
CEO - Spinnaker
We’ve been using Devyce for close to a year now and have experienced first hand the way they implemented & empowered us with generative AI. The user interface is really easy to get to grips with & simplifies what could be a complicated system. Great service, great team, great product.
![Tom Carr photo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66260a0b39d9ccc493165403/667d536fb18874e27ddf556f_Captura%20de%20pantalla%202024-06-27%20a%20las%2013.50.45.png)
###### Tom Carr
Chief Revenue Officer, HireAra
Devyce has proven to be a game-changer for everyone at Odiin. Its time-saving capabilities and seamless collaboration features have allowed the company to operate more efficiently, resulting in improved customer experiences and a more engaged and productive team.
![Glen Graves photo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66260a0b39d9ccc493165403/667d5369b7d6b4307f9c39d3_Captura%20de%20pantalla%202024-06-27%20a%20las%2013.51.13.png)
###### Glen Graves
Co-Founder, Odiin Group
![Arrow left Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66260a0b39d9ccc493165403/6630fd06531cf5dfbdfd9ab3_Arrow--left.svg)
![Arrow right icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66260a0b39d9ccc493165403/6630fd04f81260291e38448f_Arrow--right.svg)
### Our plans
AnnualMonthly
Thank you! Your submission has been received!
Oops! Something went wrong while submitting the form.
![Solo icon

per month + VAT

300 UK mobile + landline calls, with unlimited minutes.

  * ![Checkmark icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66260a0b39d9ccc493165403/6628ce69974b512847bbb3d5_Checkmark--filled.svg)

  * ![Checkmark icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66260a0b39d9ccc493165403/6628ce69974b512847bbb3d5_Checkmark--filled.svg)
Customisable voicemail.
  * ![Checkmark icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66260a0b39d9ccc493165403/6628ce69974b512847bbb3d5_Checkmark--filled.svg)
No set up or activation fees


![Team icon
](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66260a0b39d9ccc493165403/6628cac8e637bd097d30e06f_team-icon.svg)
#### Teams
##### £ 25
per user, per month + VAT
For businesses looking for more control and cost saving automation. 
[Get Started](https://devyce.com/<https:/devyce.com/pricing>)
  * ![Checkmark icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66260a0b39d9ccc493165403/6628ce69974b512847bbb3d5_Checkmark--filled.svg)
600 UK calls and 300 text messages (SMS)
  * ![Checkmark icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66260a0b39d9ccc493165403/6628ce69974b512847bbb3d5_Checkmark--filled.svg)
Multiple users and numbers.
  * ![Checkmark icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66260a0b39d9ccc493165403/6628ce69974b512847bbb3d5_Checkmark--filled.svg)
Team management portal.
  * ![Checkmark icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66260a0b39d9ccc493165403/6628ce69974b512847bbb3d5_Checkmark--filled.svg)
Full call reporting and analytics.
  * ![Checkmark icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66260a0b39d9ccc493165403/6628ce69974b512847bbb3d5_Checkmark--filled.svg)
Instant number allocation and deallocation.
  * ![Checkmark icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66260a0b39d9ccc493165403/6628ce69974b512847bbb3d5_Checkmark--filled.svg)
Call forwarding.
  * ![Checkmark icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66260a0b39d9ccc493165403/6628ce69974b512847bbb3d5_Checkmark--filled.svg)
Call grouping.
  * ![Checkmark icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66260a0b39d9ccc493165403/6628ce69974b512847bbb3d5_Checkmark--filled.svg)
Customisable auto attendant.
  * ![Checkmark icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66260a0b39d9ccc493165403/6628ce69974b512847bbb3d5_Checkmark--filled.svg)
CRM integrations.


![Enterprise icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66260a0b39d9ccc493165403/6628cac8332fd9a47e060888_enterprise-icon.svg)

generated_description:
### Devyce: The Future of Business Communication

**Overview**  
Founded in 2020 and based in London, Devyce is carving out a niche in the telecommunications space with its mission to create "the global mobile network for business." It's an ambitious endeavor led by co-founders Nick and Ed, who bring varied strengths—Nick’s background in recruiting and real estate and Ed’s strong technical foundation from a Computer Science degree at Cambridge. Having gone through Y Combinator's Batch S22, Devyce is positioned to leverage its unique relationship with a mobile network operator to evolve beyond mere software, striving to become an actual mobile network, setting it apart from traditional SaaS VoIP solutions.

**What They Do**  
Devyce offers a streamlined service that equips employees with a business phone number delivered directly through an app on their personal devices. This setup allows businesses to maintain professionalism without sacrificing employee convenience. The platform includes robust analytics and management tools so that businesses can gauge performance and make data-driven decisions. Their offerings focus on enhancing communication efficiency, allowing teams to work seamlessly, whether in-office or remotely.

**Key Features**  
1. **AI-Powered Functionality**: Live call analytics and seamless CRM integration help businesses better understand their communications.
2. **Flexibility**: The platform allows easy user management, with simple add and remove functions to keep pace with fluctuating team sizes. 
3. **No Contracts**: Devyce provides flexibility with subscription plans that have no long-term commitments, minimizing risk for businesses trying out the service.
4. **Global Coverage**: Users can secure numbers from around the world while keeping personal contact details private.

**Plans and Pricing**  
Devyce provides several pricing tiers tailored to different business needs:
- **Solo Plan**: £10.50/month, offering a single user with two numbers.
- **Teams Plan**: £25/user/month, designed for larger groups needing additional features like team management and call analytics.
- **Enterprise Solutions**: Customized pricing for teams of 50 or more, with bespoke integrations available.

**Customer Insights**  
Devyce isn’t just about technology; it’s built around real-world needs. Testimonials highlight how the platform simplifies workflows, saves administrative time, and enhances team collaboration. Users appreciate the ease of setup and the team's responsive customer service.

**Conclusion**  
Devyce is not just another communication tool; it's a complete solution aimed at improving business productivity through smarter calls. For companies navigating the hybrid work landscape, Devyce offers a compelling proposition with its blend of technological innovation and operational flexibility. If you're seeking a straightforward yet powerful communication system for your business, Devyce is worth exploring further.

**Website**: [devyce.com](https://devyce.com)
